title: FS: T206 Harry Lumley SGC 96, looks like a 10
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Harry Lumley SGC 96, looks like a 10
posts.post_content: This card looks like a 10, I can't find any flaws. Spotless Pied 150 back, perfect centering, razor sharp corners. According to PSA Pops., there are only 5 PSA 7's, and 4 PSA 8's off all backs, none higher...A PSA 8 with a Sovereign 150 back sold for $6,340 at Goodwin in 2010. Looking for offers, or would entertain T206 trade & cash proposals, thanks....

What is price? Wasnt there one that sold on ebay a few months ago. I believe it was a 9 and in $2000 range.


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk HD

[quote name="ezez420" post=1388254]What is price? Wasnt there one that sold on ebay a few months ago. I believe it was a 9 and in $2000 range. 


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk HD[/QUOTE]

Please bring me all the 9's you can for $2k....I'll be a happy camper...You need to know a little more about what you're talking about Ed...

Sorry Kevin.   I was only stating what I saw since you were quoting prices about what card went for.  This is not a sabotage of any thread. You did not have a price listed. If you did have an asking price then yes I can see possibly where you think that. 

Wrong section removed to put on the front page.

[quote name="ezez420" post=1388300]Sorry Kevin.   I was only stating what I saw since you were quoting prices about what card went for.  This is not a sabotage of any thread. You did not have a price listed. If you did have an asking price then yes I can see possibly where you think that. 

Also please do not send threats over PM and please do not advertise or offer cards that I own in the future. Especially if you don't own them.  It is unethical and dishonest.[/QUOTE]

To all members
There shouldn't be any discussing of past prices in the BST. If someone is doing something wrong, post a thread on the front page. If someone is committing fraud, as selling something they in fact don't own (to me that is fraud), then it can be mentioned here to protect others. But if you do that you really better have your ducks in a row. thanks
